document.topic_text:
Home » Adbiz » Hubbard Founder Now Backing Trump Hubbard Founder Now Backing Trump By Leslie Stimson Comments 0 Hubbard Broadcasting founder Stanley Hubbard is now backing GOP presumptive nominee Donald Trump. That’s a switch because Hubbard, a big donor to Republican candidates, is joining a pro-Trump super PAC. Previously, Hubbard had donated $10,000 to Our Principles PAC, which opposed Trump, reports Politico. Hubbard told Politico he’s still no Trump fan, but views him as a better choice for the country than Democrat Hillary Clinton.
About The Author: Leslie Stimson has been a reporter for 35+ years, starting in radio news. She’s spent the last 20 years reporting for radio trades. Leave a Comment
